original_text: Therefore I counsel that all Israel be generally gathered unto thee, from Dan even to Beersheba, as the sand that is by the sea for multitude; and that thou go to battle in thine own person.
korean_text: 나는 이렇게 계략을 세웠나이다 온 이스라엘을 단부터 브엘세바까지 바닷가의 많은 모래 같이 당신께로 모으고 친히 전장에 나가시고

sentences.original_text: that all Israel be generally gathered unto thee
as the sand that is by the sea for multitude
and that thou go to battle in thine own person
